Class Advice

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.clarionmedia.infinitum.aop.Advice

  • public class Advice
extends java.lang.Object

    Wrapper for advice annotations Before, After, and Around.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 07/16/12
    Author:
    Tyler Treat

      • isAround

        public boolean isAround()
        Indicates if the Advice is an Around type.
        Returns:
        true if it is Around type, false if not

      • beans

        public java.lang.String[] beans()
        Declares the beans and, optionally, specific methods which make up a pointcut.
        Returns:
        array of bean names, which may or may not include specific methods to create a pointcut

      • within

        public java.lang.String[] within()
        Declares the packages such that any contained type's methods make up a pointcut.
        Returns:
        array of package names to create a pointcut

      • order

        public int order()
        Declares the advice precedence. A smaller number indicates a higher precedence, while a larger number indicates a lower precedence. The default value is Integer.MAX_VALUE. The precedence determines the order in which advice is executed.
        Returns:
        the advice precedence
